AUTHOR: orels1
DESCRIPTION: Tool to get the ling to a game on steam, or the amount of owners from SteamSpy
SHORT: Gathers useful data from Steam & SteamSpy
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog was aimed to provide an easy access to Steam games list, as well as getting owners numbers from SteamSpy on those occasions when you're curious, bored, or in dire need of some numbers to back you up in an argument. 

 As all the numbers are provided by SteamSpy, they SHOULD NOT BE TREATED LIKE SALES NUMBERS
 More on sales vs owners here:http://steamspy.com/about

 Have fun! (orels1)
NAME: Steam
